name: task-serializer
description: Serialize tasks/promises for integrated control. Option for limiting number of concurrent tasks.

scripts.build-all: npm run build-dist; npm run build-tests
scripts.clean-tests: bash -c 'rm -f tests-ts/*.{js,js.map,d.ts}; rm -f scripts-ts/*.{js,js.map,d.ts}' ; rm -f dist-*/*; rmdir dist-* 2>/dev/null || true ;
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean-dist; npm run clean-tests

author: craigphicks
